Package model

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
model.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
This class administrates the information of the ship.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Ship()
    Name: Ship it is the constructor method of the class, here the clients are initialized and the ArrayList of the journeys is created.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addJourney()
    Name: addJourney adds a new journey to the ship, it adds a journey to the ArrayList.
    int getHowManyClients()
    Name: getJourney returns how many clients does the ship has.
    model.Journey getJourney()
    Name: getJourney returns the last journey added.
    boolean sailIsAllowed()
    Name: sailIsAllowed verifies the conditions needed to sail.
    model.Client selectClient​(int option)
    Name: selectClient selects a client from the array of clients of the ship.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship()
      Name: Ship it is the constructor method of the class, here the clients are initialized and the ArrayList of the journeys is created.

  • Method Details

    • addJourney

      public void addJourney()
      Name: addJourney adds a new journey to the ship, it adds a journey to the ArrayList.

    • sailIsAllowed

      public boolean sailIsAllowed()
      Name: sailIsAllowed verifies the conditions needed to sail.
      Returns:
      isAllowed. is a boolean value, true if the conditions are being respected, false if not, therefore, the ship won't be able to sail.

    • selectClient

      public model.Client selectClient​(int option)
      Name: selectClient selects a client from the array of clients of the ship.
      Parameters:
      option - . the option that the user has to enter.
      Returns:
      the selected client.

    • getJourney

      public model.Journey getJourney()
      Name: getJourney returns the last journey added.
      Returns:
      the journey in the final position of the ArrayList.

    • getHowManyClients

      public int getHowManyClients()
      Name: getJourney returns how many clients does the ship has.
      Returns:
      the length of the array of clients.
